alert.note: Alert for Sequoia NP (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:41PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL TULARE COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM PDT... At 340 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lodgepole in Sequoia NP, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Marble Fork Kaweah, Pear Lake Ranger Station, Lodgepole, Lodgepole Campground, and Dorst Creek Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
